name: Bloom: Memories
description:
A true passion project 7+ years in the making; "Bloom: Memories" combines many classic game elements into a gorgeous and unique action adventure / RPG.

Embark on an epic adventure through the forests, deserts, mountains, lakes, and dungeons as you find your place in the world and try to survive a brewing war.

Features:

  • Varied gameplay including stealth and other peaceful options
  • Uncover imaginative plants and abilities to advance
  • Find and tame a range of pets to keep you company
  • A large world with several hundred individual hand made screens to explore
  • Over 75 unique characters and models
  • And much more!!
